pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Prime Minister David Cameron of the United Kingdom | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, met today with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, David Cameron, on the margins of the Nuclear Security Summit in Washington, D.C.

Following on from their meeting in London in November 2015, the two leaders continued their dialogue on the many shared interests between Canada and the United Kingdom.

They discussed a wide range of priority issues including the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), international and regional security issues, as well as upcoming international summits.
